alert.note: Alert for Greenbrier; Monroe; Summers (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 5:15PM EST until further notice by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Blacksburg VA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in West Virginia... Greenbrier River At Alderson affecting Greenbrier, Monroe and Summers Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Greenbrier River At Alderson. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Additional low spots dowmstream from Alderson along Route 12/3 are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 14.3 feet early this evening, and will begin recede thereafter, falling below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 515 AM EST.
